import DotEnvWarning from "../../../../_admonitions/_dot_env_warning.md"

<DotEnvWarning/>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota.rs/tree/develop/client/examples/01_generate_addresses.rs
```

### Run the Example

Run the example by running the following command:

<CodeBlock className="language-bash">
    cargo run --example generate_addresses --release  -- https://api.testnet.shimmer.network
</CodeBlock>

* You can replace `https://api.testnet.shimmer.network` with any node url.
